# seite

> AI-native static site generator for the modern web

## Documentation

- [Getting Started](https://seite.sh/docs/getting-started.md): Install seite and build your first static site in under a minute.
- [Configuration](https://seite.sh/docs/configuration.md): Complete seite.toml reference — site settings, collections, build options, deployment, languages, and images.
- [Collections](https://seite.sh/docs/collections.md): Configure content collections — posts, docs, pages, changelog, roadmap, and trust center — with pagination, date handling, and RSS.
- [Templates & Themes](https://seite.sh/docs/templates.md): Customize your site with Tera templates, overridable blocks, and six bundled themes.
- [Shortcodes](https://seite.sh/docs/shortcodes.md): Reusable content components for embedding videos, callouts, figures, and custom elements in markdown
- [Multi-Language](https://seite.sh/docs/i18n.md): Add translations to your site with filename-based i18n — per-language URLs, RSS, sitemaps, and discovery files.
- [Deployment](https://seite.sh/docs/deployment.md): Deploy your seite site to GitHub Pages, Cloudflare Pages, or Netlify.
- [Trust Center](https://seite.sh/docs/trust-center.md): Build a compliance hub with certifications, subprocessors, FAQs, and security policies
- [AI Agent](https://seite.sh/docs/agent.md): Use seite agent to get AI assistance with content creation, site management, and theme generation.
- [Workspaces](https://seite.sh/docs/workspace.md): Manage multiple seite sites in a single repository with shared resources, unified dev server, and coordinated deploys.
- [MCP Server](https://seite.sh/docs/mcp-server.md): Structured AI access to site content, configuration, themes, and build tools via the Model Context Protocol.
- [Theme Gallery](https://seite.sh/docs/theme-gallery.md): Browse all bundled themes with visual previews. Install community themes or generate your own with AI.
- [CLI Reference](https://seite.sh/docs/cli-reference.md): Complete reference for all seite CLI commands, flags, and options.
- [Releases](https://seite.sh/docs/releases.md): Release history and changelog for page.

## Pages

- [About](https://seite.sh/about.md): Why seite exists, how it's built, and what it's designed to do.

## Changelog

- [v0.1.0](https://seite.sh/changelog/v0-1-0.md): Initial public release of seite — the AI-native static site generator built in Rust.

## Roadmap

- [Multi-LLM Agent Integration](https://seite.sh/roadmap/multi-llm-agent-integration.md): Support Claude Code, OpenCode, Codex CLI, and Gemini CLI as interchangeable agent backends
- [Incremental Builds](https://seite.sh/roadmap/incremental-builds.md): Only rebuild changed pages in dev mode for faster iteration on large sites
- [External Data Sources](https://seite.sh/roadmap/external-data-sources.md): Fetch JSON/YAML from URLs at build time and inject into template context
- [Math and LaTeX Rendering](https://seite.sh/roadmap/math-and-latex-rendering.md): Server-side KaTeX rendering for inline and display math blocks in markdown
- [AVIF Image Format](https://seite.sh/roadmap/avif-image-format.md): Generate AVIF variants alongside WebP in the image pipeline
- [Related Posts](https://seite.sh/roadmap/related-posts.md): Auto-suggest related content based on shared tags and keywords
- [Theme Community Ecosystem](https://seite.sh/roadmap/theme-community-ecosystem.md): Curated theme registry, browse command, validation, and contributor guide
- [Deploy History and Rollback](https://seite.sh/roadmap/deploy-history-and-rollback.md): Track deploy history with content hashing, diff previews, and one-command rollback
- [Environment-Aware Builds](https://seite.sh/roadmap/environment-aware-builds.md): Auto-detect CI environments and support multi-environment config sections
- [S3 Hosting Target](https://seite.sh/roadmap/s3-hosting-target.md): AWS S3 + CloudFront deploy support
- [Subdomain Deploys](https://seite.sh/roadmap/subdomain-deploys.md): Per-collection subdomain support for deploying collections to separate domains
